message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $110. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product and I'm willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm holding out for something closer to $105. This product really is worth it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the product's value, I am willing to pay up to $100 for it.
